title: Status Effects
content: g at the start of each turn. Entangled Cannot move. Attack Rolls against the creature have Advantage. Enthralled No longer in control of itself. Enwebbed Cannot move. Attack rolls against you have Advantage, while your attack rolls have Disadvantage. You also have Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws. Exhausted TBC Feeble Deal half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength. Frenzied Deal 2 extra damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects. Has Resistance to physical
